meaningMnemonic: When one person is in a position to <kanji>judge</kanji> everyone <kanji>alone</kanji> by themselves, they're definitely a part of a <vocabulary>dictatorship</vocabulary>. One person should never be alone to judge everyone because that's how dictators are made and they're not so great.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
